Implementing safety rules & regulations set by the company
and the local authority for the accident prevention and 
control.
Conduct regular site inspection to identify hazards, risk and 
monitor the activity of the work forces.

the HSE Manager for the necessary action.

any accident or incident.

for corrective action.

competent authorities.

height, scaffolding, hot works, painting, housekeeping and

gloves, safety harness, conduct toolbox meeting.

company.
Ensure all safety equipment are I place and in good 
conditions.
To prompt and maintain high fire safety standard. 
Provide proper First Aid treatment.
